summary: This is a running board or inmate movement log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 30, 2019. It records inmate counts, movements, and activities, including the transfer of Jeffrey Epstein from unit HA to unit ZA at 12:21 PM.

events.title: Epstein's Unit Transfer in MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was moved from housing unit HA to housing unit ZA at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: This document is a prison movement log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated July 30, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is recorded as being transferred from housing unit HA to housing unit ZA at 12:21 PM on that date.
The log shows a starting inmate count of 767 and tracks the movements of multiple inmates for court, hospital, and removal purposes.
